name: chenaikit
description: A TypeScript toolkit for building AI-powered blockchain applications

scripts.backend:build: cd packages/core && pnpm build && cd ../cli && pnpm build && cd ../../backend && pnpm build
scripts.backend:test: cd packages/core && pnpm test && cd ../cli && pnpm test && cd ../../backend && pnpm test
scripts.blockchain:build: cd contracts/credit-score && cargo build && cd ../fraud-detect && cargo build && cd ../common-utils && cargo build
scripts.blockchain:test: cd contracts/credit-score && cargo test && cd ../fraud-detect && cargo test && cd ../common-utils && cargo test
scripts.frontend:build: cd examples/credit-scoring-app && pnpm build && cd ../wallet-chatbot && pnpm build && cd ../fraud-detection-service && pnpm build && cd ../../frontend && pnpm build
scripts.frontend:test: cd examples/credit-scoring-app && pnpm test && cd ../wallet-chatbot && pnpm test && cd ../fraud-detection-service && pnpm test && cd ../../frontend && pnpm test

author: ChenAIKit Team
